text: Petit dinner de quartier sans prétention qui fait de bons sous-marins, poutines, club sandwichs, etc. Simple et pas cher. La serveuse est toujours très sympathique.

There isn't really much to say about this business, except that it is simple and excellent. Me and my girlfriend have been here several times and we have never had a criticism about it. Keep up the good work. We will keep returning
Always great breakfast, perfect basic spot. Authentic atmosphere, friendly people and great food quality for an unbeatable low price.
